author: ajsutton
content: <@199561711278227457> Was it intentional that the Sepolia bootnode is the same as the ropsten one? It seems to be just a bootnode so doesn't have eth2 in the ENR and isn't network specific so it will work, just wanted to check so you aren't running a separate sepolia bootnode that will never get used. ðŸ™‚

content: Yea it's a generic bootnode that we reuse for networks. I haven't setup the EF one yet (will do so later today) and will update client  team bootnodes as well once they're up.
